titleStmt.title: Poor Robins ansvver to Mr. Thomas Danson author of the late friendly debate between Satan and Sherlocke: as also of another pamphlet since published; pretended to be a defence of that debate against Poor Robin and others. By the author of Poor Robin's Weekly Intelligence. This may be printed, Feb. 6. 1677. Ro: L'Estrange.

Poor Robins ansvver to Mr. Thomas Danson author of the late friendly debate between Satan and Sherlocke: as also of another pamphlet since published; pretended to be a defence of that debate against Poor Robin and others. By the author of Poor Robin's Weekly Intelligence. This may be printed, Feb. 6. 1677. Ro: L'Estrange.
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Authorship of the "Poor Robin" pamphlets is usually attributed to William Winstanley, though imitators undoubtedly wrote some of them.--Cf. NUC pre 1956.
Caption title on p. 1 reads: Poor Robin's answer, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
